mapper.select: SELECT SEC_CODE FROM AI_PW_SEC WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AI_PW_SEC( USER_NO, SEC_CODE, START_DT, END_DT ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{secCode}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) );
mapper.update: UPDATE AI_PW_SEC SET SEC_CODE = #{secCode}, START_DT = NOW(), END_DT = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
